value.description: As a nurse, Redheart has seen it all; she knows that being prepared for any eventuality is of vital importance.\n\nGenerates {MLRP_NurseRedheartMedicineSpawnAmount} medicine every {MLRP_NurseRedheartMedicineSpawnTime} day(s).

Unlike when Flim and Flam were using it, the Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000 will produce something just as good as cider, provided it has enough power.\n\nGenerates {MLRP_SSCS6KBeerSpawnAmount} Beer every {MLRP_SSCS6KBeerSpawnTime} days.
It goes without saying that Rainbow 'Danger' Dash is the very ponification of speed.\n\nCarrying her makes you feel fast, as well as more confident in your combat abilities.
It goes without saying that Rainbow 'Danger' Dash is the very ponification of speed.\n\nCarrying her makes you feel faster on your feet.

The Tree of Harmony is a magical tree that once held the Elements of Harmony. Nobody knows how it ended up on the rim, but many people suspect that science was involved.

If a person (psycaster or not) meditates near the tree, it will grow harmony grass around its base. Once enough grass is grown, it becomes possible to carry out a psychic linking ritual with the tree and upgrade a person's psychic powers. Only tribal peoples know the secret of this ritual. Tribal psycasters are also able to draw psyfocus from the Tree of Harmony while meditating at it.

The tree's psychic properties are weakened if artificial structures are placed nearby. They refuse to be caged or studied, and must remain part of nature.

Most tribes believe that these trees are not simply trees, but are rather the physical extremities of a single world spirit, while bronies believe them to be a physical extension of their beliefs.

value.enoughPlantsLetterLabel: About: Linking with the Tree of Harmony

value.enoughPlantsLetterText:
The Tree of Harmony now has {0} harmony grass around it. This is enough for a tribal person to begin their first linking ritual!

The linking ritual gives a level of psylink and the ability to use psychic powers. Upgrading to a higher level requires 20 grass.

The harmony grass requirements for linking rituals to upgrade psycasters are:

{1}

Note: Only those with the nature focus type can meditate to or link with the Tree of Harmony. You can see a person's focus types by looking at their info card with the 'i' button.

value.message: The Tree of Harmony has died and emitted a disturbing psychic scream.

value.description:
A grass infused with luminous microorganisms. Tribal peoples find that this grass grows around the base of the Tree of Harmony as they meditate. It seems to reflect some kind of strengthening of the tree's psychic power.

Animals refuse to eat anima grass, which tribal stories say is done out of respect.

Bronies believe that the grass is a physical extension of the tree's power, and that it holds the key to opening a link to Equestria, but the grass degenerates into normal plant matter when observed too closely.

li.text: IMPORTANT: You will need to restart RimWorld after changing any of these settings.
These settings will also be applied to child-sized plushies.
This value will be halved for child-sized plushies.

li.label: Plushies become tainted if worn by a corpse
NPC faction is always present when starting a new colony
Diamond Dog faction is always present when starting a new colony
Batpony faction is always present when starting a new colony
Weapon requires Elements of Harmony to craft

li.text: If you set this value to false, making a rainbow laser will require 3 advanced components instead of the Elements.

li.label: Building a Discord lamp requires {MLRP_DiscordLampStuffRequired} stuff

li.text: IMPORTANT: This setting will be ignored because you are using the Medieval Overhaul patches.
This amount will be halved, doubled, tripled or quintupled where necessary.
[Ry]Rimcraft Metals: Recipes to bulk create bars from ore will use triple this amount.
Medieval Overhaul: These values do not apply to coal usage.
This will also determine how much stuff is required to build one.

li.label: Turn the anima tree into the Tree of Harmony
Child-equippable Rainbow Dash plushie has the same bonuses as the adult version
Sweetie Bot mechanoids appear in mechanoid clusters
Mute Sweetie Bot mechanoid call sound
Prevent MedPods from curing the Cutie Pox
